summary: Suryaveer, an ex-army officer, is assigned the task of protecting a young girl, Anamika. When Anamika gets kidnapped, he decides to use all his skills to rescue her.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Arjun Rampal|Perizaad Zorabian|Rucha Vaidya|Vikram Chatwal|Daya Shankar Pandey|Akhilendra Mishra|Aditya Lakhia|Raj Zutshi|Kelly Dorji|Denzil Smith|Yuth|Abhishek Bachchan|Lara Dutta|Sanjay Dutt
title: Ek Ajnabee
